committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain lands for inclusion in the Saratoga National Historical Park, in the State of New York.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified lands to expand the Saratoga National Historic Park in New York. Authorizes appropriations from the Land and Water Conservation Fund for such land acquisition.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain lands for inclusion in the Saratoga National Historical Park, in the State of New York.
